attributes.action: Leave the current Organ Donor scheme in place, you MUST register and MUST carry a card if you WANT to donate, it should be choice not a must
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Giving the news today about "Everyone should be seen as a potential organ donor on their death unless they expressly request not to be".

You should be allowed to choose if you want to donate, if they say you must opt out, and people do, surly it is not going to change anything? 

And what are they going to do should this happen, the govenment will be taking ownership of our bodies next.

Leave it as it is, if you want to donate you should make this known.

It is your body, not theirs!!
